name: Crazy Pixel Streaker
description: A Fresh and Insane Brawler with Roguelike elements. Lead a fellowship of jackasses abducted by angry aliens and forced to spread chaos into the most famous sports events. Instant fun, Retro Arcade style, for up to 4 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Pentium Dual-Core T4400 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4500 / NVIDIA GT430 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great party game with friends. Playing alone makes you remember your undying sadness and that your friends don't apreciate you enough to spend 10$ and remain your freinds. The gameplay is solid and challenging enough to give you a good run for your money, the story is awesomr (nuff' said), the music if pretty hot and the animations are fun and well done. Overall, great game!
